name: MyVariant.info
description: The MyVariant.info API provides access to a wide collection of gene variants data.

services.name: MyVariant.info variant query service
services.description: Make variant query and return matching variant list.

inputParameter.name: q
inputParameter.description: The query string containing dbSNP identifiers, chromosome and interval, or variant type

inputParameter.name: fields
inputParameter.description: a comma-separated fields to limit the fields returned from the matching gene hits. The supported field names can be found from any variant object (e.g. http://myvariant.info/v1/variant/chr16:g.28883241A>G). Note that it supports dot notation, and wildcards as well, e.g., you can pass dbnsfp, dbnsfp.genename, or dbnsfp.aa.*

inputParameter.name: callback
inputParameter.description: pass a callback parameter to make a JSONP call.

inputParameter.name: size
inputParameter.description: The maximum number of matching variant hits to return (with a cap of 1000 at the moment)

inputParameter.name: from
inputParameter.description: The number of matching variant hits to skip, starting from 0. Combining with size parameter can be useful for paging.

inputParameter.name: sort
inputParameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields to sort on. Prefix with "-" for descending order, otherwise in ascending order. Default: sort by matching scores in descending order.

inputParameter.name: facets
inputParameter.description: A set of comma-separated fields to return facets.

inputParameter.name: email
inputParameter.description: If you are regular users of our services, we encourage you to provide us an email, so that we can better track the usage or follow up with you

services.name: MyVariant.info variant annotation service
services.description: Retrieve variant annotation based on HGVS name based ids

inputParameter.name: variantid
inputParameter.description: HGVS name based variant id, using genomic location based on hg19 human genome assembly

inputParameter.name: fields
inputParameter.description: a comma-separated fields to limit the fields returned from the matching gene hits. The supported field names can be found from any variant object (e.g. http://myvariant.info/v1/variant/chr16:g.28883241A>G). Note that it supports dot notation, and wildcards as well, e.g., you can pass dbnsfp, dbnsfp.genename, or dbnsfp.aa.*

inputParameter.name: callback
inputParameter.description: pass a callback parameter to make a JSONP call.

inputParameter.name: email
inputParameter.description: If you are regular users of our services, we encourage you to provide us an email, so that we can better track the usage or follow up with you
